49742.en: <voice 00070_00049742><start_lip_sync n02034 _normal m00001>Oi! What do you mean we can't go to Gran Zedora!?<stop_lip_animation n02034 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49742.ja:
<voice 00070_00049742><start_lip_sync n02034 _normal m00001>「おいっ！　グランゼドーラに行けねえって
　どういうこった！？<stop_lip_animation n02034 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49742.ko:
<voice 00070_00049742><start_lip_sync n02034 _normal m00001>: 이봐! 그랑제도라에 갈 수 없다니
　그게 무슨 소리야!?<stop_lip_animation n02034 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49742.zh-Hans:
<voice 00070_00049742><start_lip_sync n02034 _normal m00001>喂！你说不能去古兰泽朵拉？
这是怎么回事？！<stop_lip_animation n02034 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49742.zh-Hant:
<voice 00070_00049742><start_lip_sync n02034 _normal m00001>喂！你說不能去古蘭澤朵拉？
這是怎麼回事！？<stop_lip_animation n02034 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49743.en:
<voice 00120_00049743><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>As I have already explained, this gate is closed by
order of Princess Anlucia of Gran Zedora Kingdom.<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49743.ja:
<voice 00120_00049743><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>「先ほどから　説明している通り
　この門は　グランゼドーラ王国の王女
　アンルシアさまの　ご命令で　閉ざしている。<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49743.ko:
<voice 00120_00049743><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>: 방금 설명했듯이
　이 문은 그랑제도라 왕국의 공주
　안루시아 님의 명령으로 봉쇄 중이다.<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49743.zh-Hans:
<voice 00120_00049743><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>就如同刚才我所说的，
这道门奉古兰泽朵拉王国的公主
安露西雅殿下之命关闭。<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49743.zh-Hant:
<voice 00120_00049743><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>就如同剛才我所說明的，
這道門奉古蘭澤朵拉王國的公主
安露西亞殿下之命關閉。<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49744.en: <voice 00150_00049744><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>No one will be allowed through.<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49744.ja: <voice 00150_00049744><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>「何者であろうと　通すわけにはゆかぬ。<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49744.ko: <voice 00150_00049744><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>: 그 누구든 여길 통과할 순 없다.<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49744.zh-Hans: <voice 00150_00049744><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>不管是谁都不能放行。<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49744.zh-Hant: <voice 00150_00049744><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>不管是誰都不能放行。<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49745.en:
<voice 00200_00049745><start_lip_sync n02034 _normal m00001>I'm begging you! I finally made it back to
Lendersia, and I need to see my family in
Gran Zedora!<stop_lip_animation n02034 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49745.ja:
<voice 00200_00049745><start_lip_sync n02034 _normal m00001>「頼む！　やっと　レンダーシアに
　戻れたところなんだ。
　グランゼドーラの……　家族に会わせてくれ！<stop_lip_animation n02034 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49745.ko:
<voice 00200_00049745><start_lip_sync n02034 _normal m00001>: 부탁이야!
　이제 겨우 렌더시아에 돌아온 참이라고.
　그랑제도라에 사는 가족과 만나게 해 줘!<stop_lip_animation n02034 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49745.zh-Hans:
<voice 00200_00049745><start_lip_sync n02034 _normal m00001>拜托你！我好不容易才
回到冷达西亚。
让我去见见……在古兰泽朵拉的家人吧！<stop_lip_animation n02034 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49745.zh-Hant:
<voice 00200_00049745><start_lip_sync n02034 _normal m00001>拜託你！我好不容易才
回到冷達西亞。
讓我去見見……在古蘭澤朵拉的家人吧！<stop_lip_animation n02034 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49746.en:
<voice 00302_00049746><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>I don't care what the reason is.
You cannot pass!<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49746.ja: <voice 00302_00049746><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>「どんな理由があろうとも　絶対に通さぬ！！<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49746.ko: <voice 00302_00049746><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>: 이유가 뭐든 들여보낼 수 없다!!<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49746.zh-Hans: <voice 00302_00049746><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>不管什么理由都不能放行！<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49746.zh-Hant: <voice 00302_00049746><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>不管什麼理由都不能放行！<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000458.en:
<voice 00365_29000458><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>Waitー! Behind that door is some lovely junk waiting
for me, I'm sure of it!!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000458.ja:
<voice 00365_29000458><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「もきぃー！
　この門の向こうで　素敵なガラクタが
　わしを待っているに　違いないんですッ！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000458.ko:
<voice 00365_29000458><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 끄악~!
　저 문 너머에서 멋진 고물이
　절 기다리고 있을 게 분명합니다!!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000458.zh-Hans:
<voice 00365_29000458><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>啊咿——！
这扇门的另一边，一定有很棒的
废品在等着我啊！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000458.zh-Hant:
<voice 00365_29000458><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>啊咿──！
這扇門的另一邊，一定有很棒的
廢品在等著我啊！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000459.en:
<voice 00366_29000459><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>Something...Something is...Wrong... It's no use.
The mist stopped me from foreseeing anything
important again.<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000459.ja:
<voice 00366_29000459><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>「何か……何かが……おかしい……。
　だめだ。また　靄におおわれたように
　肝心なことが　見えない……。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000459.ko:
<voice 00366_29000459><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>: 뭔가…… 뭔가…… 이상해…….
　안 되겠어. 또 안개가 낀 것처럼
　중요한 부분이 보이지 않아…….<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000459.zh-Hans:
<voice 00366_29000459><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>感觉……好像……怪怪的……
不行，而且就像是被雾气笼罩一样，
重要的地方都看不到……<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000459.zh-Hant:
<voice 00366_29000459><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>感覺……好像……怪怪的……
不行，而且就像是被霧氣籠罩一樣，
重要的地方都看不到……<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49748.en:
<voice 00861_00049748><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Hmm... it looks as if the gates to
Gran Zedora are closed.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49748.ja:
<voice 00861_00049748><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「……ふむ。グランゼドーラへの門は
　閉ざされているようですね。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49748.ko:
<voice 00861_00049748><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: ……흠, 그랑제도라로 가는 문이
　봉쇄된 모양이군요.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49748.zh-Hans:
<voice 00861_00049748><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>……嗯，看来通往古兰泽朵拉的门
被关闭了。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49748.zh-Hant:
<voice 00861_00049748><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>……嗯，看來通往古蘭澤朵拉的門
被關閉了。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49749.en: <voice 00987_00049749><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>We meet again. <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49749.ja: <voice 00987_00049749><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「また　会いましたね。<pc>さん。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49749.ko: <voice 00987_00049749><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 또 뵙는군요, <pc> 씨.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49749.zh-Hans: <voice 00987_00049749><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>又见面了呢，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49749.zh-Hant: <voice 00987_00049749><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>又見到面了呢，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49750.en:
<voice 01035_00049750><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Since you're planning on meeting
Gran Zedora's princess... I'll tell you
how to get past that gate.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49750.ja:
<voice 01035_00049750><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「<pc>さんは　グランゼドーラ王国の
　姫に　会いにいくのでしたね……。
　ならば　あの門を越える方法を教えましょう。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49750.ko:
<voice 01035_00049750><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: <pc> 씨는 그랑제도라 왕국의
　공주를 만나러 가신다고 하셨죠? 그렇다면
　저 문을 통과할 방법을 가르쳐 드리겠습니다.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49750.zh-Hans:
<voice 01035_00049750><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001><pc>是要去见
古兰泽朵拉王国的公主吧……
那么，让我来告诉你如何才能通过那道门。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49750.zh-Hant:
<voice 01035_00049750><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001><pc>是要去見
古蘭澤朵拉王國的公主吧……
那麼，讓我來告訴你如何才能通過那道門。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49751.en:
<voice 01287_00049751><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Lendersia has three other places you
should visit: a village called Melsandy,
a town called Celed, and a country
called Al-Ahagiro.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49751.ja:
<voice 01287_00049751><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「レンダーシアには　グランゼドーラ王国の他に
　メルサンディという村　セレドという町
　さらに　アラハギーロという国が　あります。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49751.ko:
<voice 01287_00049751><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 렌더시아에는 그랑제도라 왕국 외에도
　메르상디 마을, 셀레도 마을,
　그리고 아라하길로 왕국이 존재합니다.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49751.zh-Hans:
<voice 01287_00049751><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>在冷达西亚，除了古兰泽朵拉王国，
还有梅尔桑蒂村、塞莱德镇，
以及艾拉哈奇罗王国。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49751.zh-Hant:
<voice 01287_00049751><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>在冷達西亞，除了古蘭澤朵拉王國，
還有梅爾桑蒂村、塞萊德鎮，
以及艾拉哈奇羅王國。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49752.en:
<voice 01335_00049752><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>You must travel to those places, and search
for the three butterflies.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49752.ja:
<voice 01335_00049752><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「あなたは　それらの地をめぐり
　３匹の蝶を探すのです。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49752.ko:
<voice 01335_00049752><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 그 세 지역을 돌며
　3마리의 나비를 모으십시오.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49752.zh-Hans:
<voice 01335_00049752><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>你要去这些地方
寻找３只蝴蝶。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49752.zh-Hant:
<voice 01335_00049752><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>你要去這些地方
尋找３隻蝴蝶。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

49753.en:
<voice 01392_00049753><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>When you return here with the three
butterflies from each of those places, the
way to Gran Zedora will open.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49753.ja:
<voice 01392_00049753><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「それぞれの場所で手に入れた
　３匹の蝶とともに　ここへ戻った時
　グランゼドーラへの道は　開かれるでしょう。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49753.ko:
<voice 01392_00049753><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 각 지역에서 손에 넣은
　3마리 나비와 함께 이곳으로 돌아오면
　그랑제도라로 가는 길이 열릴 겁니다.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49753.zh-Hans:
<voice 01392_00049753><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>你在这些地方找到３只蝴蝶后
就带回这里，届时通往
古兰泽朵拉的大门便会开启。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
49753.zh-Hant:
<voice 01392_00049753><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>你在這些地方找到３隻蝴蝶後
就帶回來這裡，屆時通往
古蘭澤朵拉的大門便會開啟。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

70676.en:
<voice 01422_00070676><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>So long, <pc>.
I'll see you again soon...<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
70676.ja:
<voice 01422_00070676><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「それでは　<pc>さん。
　いずれ　また……。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
70676.ko:
<voice 01422_00070676><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 그럼 <pc> 씨.
　언젠가 다시 만나기를…….<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
70676.zh-Hans:
<voice 01422_00070676><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>那么，<pc>，
我们有缘再会吧……<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
70676.zh-Hant:
<voice 01422_00070676><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>那麼，<pc>，
我們後會有期……<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50133.en: <voice 00200_00050133><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>I'm glad to see you doing well.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50133.ja: <voice 00200_00050133><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「お元気そうで　何よりです。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50133.ko: <voice 00200_00050133><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 잘 지내신 것 같아 다행이군요.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50133.zh-Hans: <voice 00200_00050133><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>如此有精神，真是太好了。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50133.zh-Hant: <voice 00200_00050133><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>看來如此有精神，真是太好了。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50134.en:
<voice 00355_00050134><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Ehh? You say you've collected the 3 Butterflies, but
still are unable able to pass through the gate?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50134.ja:
<voice 00355_00050134><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「えっ？　３匹の蝶を集めたのに
　グランゼドーラの門を　通れなかったと
　そう　おっしゃりたいのですか？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50134.ko:
<voice 00355_00050134><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 예? 나비 3마리를 모두 모았는데도
　그랑제도라문을 통과할 수 없다고
　말씀하고 싶으신 겁니까?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50134.zh-Hans:
<voice 00355_00050134><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>什么？你是说你已经找齐了３只蝴蝶，
但通往古兰泽朵拉的大门
却还是没有打开吗？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50134.zh-Hant:
<voice 00355_00050134><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>什麼？你是說你已經找齊了３隻蝴蝶，
但通往古蘭澤朵拉的大門
卻還是沒有打開嗎？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50135.en:
<voice 00395_00050135><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Heheh. Just as I'd expect from you, <pc>.
Already collected the 3 Butterflies, have you.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50135.ja:
<voice 00395_00050135><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「ふふっ。さすがは　<pc>さん。
　もう　３匹の蝶を　集めてしまったのですね。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50135.ko:
<voice 00395_00050135><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 후후, 역시 <pc> 씨군요.
　벌써 3마리 나비를 다 모으다니.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50135.zh-Hans:
<voice 00395_00050135><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>呵呵，真不愧是<pc>，
这么快就找齐了３只蝴蝶。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50135.zh-Hant:
<voice 00395_00050135><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>呵呵，真不愧是<pc>，
這麼快就找齊了３隻蝴蝶。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50136.en:
<voice 00472_00050136><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Heheh. I guess you realized you couldn't get through
with just the 3 Butterflies. Just as I'd expect from
you, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50136.ja:
<voice 00472_00050136><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「ふふっ。３匹の蝶を　集めただけでは
　通れないことまで　お見通しでしたか。
　さすがは　<pc>さん。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50136.ko:
<voice 00472_00050136><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 후후, 3마리 나비를 모으기만 해서는
　통과할 수 없다는 것까지 예상하셨군요.
　역시 <pc> 씨십니다.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50136.zh-Hans:
<voice 00472_00050136><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>呵呵，原来你已经猜到，
光是找齐３只蝴蝶还不能通过这里。
真不愧是<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50136.zh-Hant:
<voice 00472_00050136><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>呵呵，原來你已經猜到，
光是找齊３隻蝴蝶還不能通過這裡。
真不愧是<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50137.en: <voice 00502_00050137><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Now, please give them to me.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50137.ja: <voice 00502_00050137><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「では　その蝶たちを　私に。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50137.ko: <voice 00502_00050137><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 그럼 그 나비들을 제게 주십시오.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50137.zh-Hans: <voice 00502_00050137><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>那么，就把那些蝴蝶交给我吧。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50137.zh-Hant: <voice 00502_00050137><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>那麼，就把那些蝴蝶交給我吧。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50298.en:
<pc> gave Claws the Butterfly Hairpin,
Amber Jewel, and Papillon Bracelet!
50298.ja:
<pc>は　クロウズに
蝶のかみかざりと　こはくの宝珠と
パピヨンブレスを　渡した！
50298.ko:
{pc}|hpp(은,는) 크로우즈에게
나비 머리 장식과 호박 구슬,
그리고 파피용 브레이슬릿을 건넸다!
50298.zh-Hans:
<pc>将蝴蝶发饰和
琥珀宝珠和蝴蝶手镯
交给了库洛乌兹！
50298.zh-Hant:
<pc>將蝴蝶髮飾和
琥珀寶珠和蝴蝶手鐲
給了庫洛茲！

50138.en:
<voice 00619_00050138><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Marvelous... Butterflies are wonderful, aren't they?
Just looking at them, one feels like they're taken to
another world.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50138.ja:
<voice 00619_00050138><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「すばらしい……。
　やはり　蝶は　いいですね。
　見ているだけで　異世界に誘われそうです。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50138.ko:
<voice 00619_00050138><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 아름답네요…….
　역시 나비는 멋져요. 바라보기만 해도
　이세계로 이끌어 줄 것만 같군요.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50138.zh-Hans:
<voice 00619_00050138><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>太棒了……
蝴蝶果然漂亮。
光是这样看着，感觉就好像要被带去异世界了。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50138.zh-Hant:
<voice 00619_00050138><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>太棒了……
蝴蝶果然漂亮。
光是這樣看著，感覺就好像要被帶去異世界了。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50139.en:
<voice 00694_00050139><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Thank you very much. Well then, I will see
you...<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50139.ja:
<voice 00694_00050139><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「ありがとうございました　<pc>さん。
　では　また……。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50139.ko:
<voice 00694_00050139><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 감사합니다, <pc> 씨.
　그럼 전 이만…….<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50139.zh-Hans:
<voice 00694_00050139><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>谢谢你，<pc>。
那么再见……<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50139.zh-Hant:
<voice 00694_00050139><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>謝謝你，<pc>。
那麼再見……<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50140.en:
<voice 00819_00050140><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>...Heheh. Just kidding. Of course I didn't
forget about opening the gate to
Gran Zedora.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50140.ja:
<voice 00819_00050140><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「……ふふっ。冗談ですよ。
　もちろん　グランゼドーラの門が
　開かれるという話も　忘れていません。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50140.ko:
<voice 00819_00050140><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: ……후후, 농담입니다.
　물론 그랑제도라문이
　열릴 거란 이야기도 잊지 않았고요.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50140.zh-Hans:
<voice 00819_00050140><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>……呵呵，开玩笑的，
我当然没有忘记
要打开古兰泽朵拉大门。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50140.zh-Hant:
<voice 00819_00050140><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>……呵呵，開玩笑的，
我當然沒有忘記
要打開古蘭澤朵拉大門。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50141.en: <voice 00863_00050141><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Just wait there for a moment.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50141.ja: <voice 00863_00050141><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「まあ　そこで　待っていてください。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50141.ko: <voice 00863_00050141><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 일단 거기서 기다리세요.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50141.zh-Hans: <voice 00863_00050141><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>那么，请在这里稍等。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50141.zh-Hant: <voice 00863_00050141><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>那麼，請在這裡稍待一會兒。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50142.en: <voice 00918_00050142><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Oh? Could it be... <pc>?<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50142.ja: <voice 00918_00050142><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「あら？　もしかして……　<pc>さん？<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50142.ko: <voice 00918_00050142><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 어라? 혹시…… <pc> 씨?<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50142.zh-Hans: <voice 00918_00050142><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>咦？难道你是……<pc>？<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50142.zh-Hant: <voice 00918_00050142><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>咦？難道你是……<pc>？<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50143.en:
<voice 01093_00050143><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Yeah, I knew it! It's me, Mishua. From
Melsandy Village, remember?<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50143.ja:
<voice 01093_00050143><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「ああ！　やっぱり　<pc>さん！
　……私です。メルサンディ村で
　お世話になった　ミシュアです。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50143.ko:
<voice 01093_00050143><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 아아! 역시 <pc> 씨네요!
　……저예요, 메르상디 마을에서
　신세 졌던 미슈아예요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50143.zh-Hans:
<voice 01093_00050143><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>真的！果然是<pc>！
……是我啊。我是曾在梅尔桑蒂村
受你帮助的米修娅。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50143.zh-Hant:
<voice 01093_00050143><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>真的耶！果然是<pc>！
……是我啊。我是曾在梅爾桑蒂村
受你幫助的蜜雪雅。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50144.en:
<voice 01123_00050144><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>I wanted to thank you for everything. Sorry
that I left on such short notice.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50144.ja:
<voice 01123_00050144><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「あの時は　ありがとうございました。
　お礼も　ちゃんと言えずに
　行ってしまって　ごめんなさい。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50144.ko:
<voice 01123_00050144><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 그때는 감사했어요.
　제대로 인사도 안 하고
　사라져서 죄송해요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50144.zh-Hans:
<voice 01123_00050144><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>那个时候真的很谢谢你！
我没有好好道谢就离开了，
真是抱歉。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50144.zh-Hant:
<voice 01123_00050144><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>那個時候真的很謝謝你！
我沒有好好道謝就離開了，
真是抱歉。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50145.en:
<voice 01153_00050145><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Actually, I... just remembered that I have to
go to Gran Zedora, and I can't get it out of
my head...<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50145.ja:
<voice 01153_00050145><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「じつは　私……　思いだしたことがあって
　グランゼドーラに　行かなくちゃって
　そのことで　アタマが　いっぱいで……。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50145.ko:
<voice 01153_00050145><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 사실 저…… 기억난 게 있어서
　그랑제도라에 가야 한다는 생각으로
　머릿속이 가득했거든요…….<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50145.zh-Hans:
<voice 01153_00050145><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>其实我……想起了一件事，
所以我一定要去古兰泽朵拉，
我现在满脑子都是这件事……<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50145.zh-Hant:
<voice 01153_00050145><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>其實我……想起了一件事，
所以我一定要去古蘭澤朵拉，
我現在滿腦子都是這件事……<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50146.en: <voice 01216_00050146><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>...Mishua is not my real name.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50146.ja:
<voice 01216_00050146><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「……ミシュアというのは
　私の　本当の名前ではありません。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50146.ko:
<voice 01216_00050146><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: ……미슈아는
　제 진짜 이름이 아니에요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50146.zh-Hans:
<voice 01216_00050146><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>……其实我真正的名字
不叫米修娅。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50146.zh-Hant:
<voice 01216_00050146><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>……其實我真正的名字
不叫蜜雪雅。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50147.en:
<voice 01246_00050147><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>That's all I can think about right now,
but I have a feeling that once I get to
Gran Zedora Kingdom, I'll have it all figured out...<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50147.ja:
<voice 01246_00050147><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「今は　それしか思いだせませんが
　グランゼドーラ王国に行けば
　すべてが　わかるような気がするんです……。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50147.ko:
<voice 01246_00050147><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 지금은 그것밖에 기억나지 않지만
　그랑제도라 왕국에 가면
　모든 걸 알 수 있을 거란 느낌이 들어요…….<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50147.zh-Hans:
<voice 01246_00050147><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>尽管我现在只能想起这件事，
但我觉得去了古兰泽朵拉王国之后，
应该就能想起所有的事了……<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50147.zh-Hant:
<voice 01246_00050147><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>儘管我現在只能想起這件事，
但我覺得去了古蘭澤朵拉王國之後，
應該就能想起所有的事了……<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50148.en: <voice 01321_00050148><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>That's the gate to Gran Zedora...<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50148.ja: <voice 01321_00050148><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「あれが　グランゼドーラへの門……。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50148.ko: <voice 01321_00050148><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 저게 그랑제도라로 가는 문…….<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50148.zh-Hans: <voice 01321_00050148><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>那就是通往古兰泽朵拉的门啊……<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50148.zh-Hant: <voice 01321_00050148><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>那就是通往古蘭澤朵拉的門啊……<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50149.en:
<voice 01421_00050149><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>I'm going to go now. We'll see each other
again soon.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50149.ja:
<voice 01421_00050149><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>「私　行きますね。
　それじゃ　<pc>さん。また　どこかで。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50149.ko:
<voice 01421_00050149><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>: 전 이만 가 볼게요.
　그럼 <pc> 씨, 다음에 또 봬요.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50149.zh-Hans:
<voice 01421_00050149><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>我先走了。
那么，<pc>后会有期。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50149.zh-Hant:
<voice 01421_00050149><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>我先走了。
那麼，<pc>後會有期。<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50150.en: <voice 01561_00050150><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Please follow me.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50150.ja: <voice 01561_00050150><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「私に　ついてきてください。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50150.ko: <voice 01561_00050150><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 절 따라오세요.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50150.zh-Hans: <voice 01561_00050150><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>请跟我来。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50150.zh-Hant: <voice 01561_00050150><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>請跟我來。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50151.en:
<voice 01784_00050151><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>Halt, young lady! This gate is closed by decree of
Gran Zedora Kingdom's Princess, Lady Anlucia.<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50151.ja:
<voice 01784_00050151><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>「待て　娘！
　この門は　グランゼドーラ王国の王女
　アンルシアさまの　ご命令で　閉ざしている。<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50151.ko:
<voice 01784_00050151><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>: 기다려라, 계집!
　이 문은 그랑제도라 왕국의 공주
　안루시아 님의 명령으로 봉쇄 중이다.<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50151.zh-Hans:
<voice 01784_00050151><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>站住，小姑娘！
这道门已经奉古兰泽朵拉王国的
公主安露西雅殿下之命关闭。<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50151.zh-Hant:
<voice 01784_00050151><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>站住，小姑娘！
這道門已經奉古蘭澤朵拉王國的
公主安露西亞殿下之命關閉。<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50152.en: <voice 01814_00050152><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>No matter who one may be... Huh!?<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50152.ja: <voice 01814_00050152><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>「何者であろうと……　うん！？<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50152.ko: <voice 01814_00050152><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>: 그 누구든…… 응!?<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50152.zh-Hans: <voice 01814_00050152><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>不管是谁都……嗯？！<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50152.zh-Hant: <voice 01814_00050152><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>不管是誰都……嗯？！<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50153.en: <voice 01976_00050153><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>M-my apologies! Please, please proceed!<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50153.ja:
<voice 01976_00050153><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>「し　失礼しました！
　どうぞ　お通りくださいっ！<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50153.ko:
<voice 01976_00050153><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>: 시, 실례했습니다!
　지나가십시오!<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50153.zh-Hans:
<voice 01976_00050153><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>失、失礼了！
请您过去吧！<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50153.zh-Hant:
<voice 01976_00050153><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>失、失禮了！
請您過去吧！<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50154.en: <voice 02264_00050154><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>Thank you for your service!<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50154.ja: <voice 02264_00050154><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>「お役目　ご苦労さまですっ！<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50154.ko: <voice 02264_00050154><start_lip_sync n02032 _normal m00001>: 임무, 수고 많으십니다!<stop_lip_animation n02032 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50155.en: <voice 02369_00050155><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001><pc>, what are you doing? Let's go.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50155.ja:
<voice 02369_00050155><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「<pc>さん。何してるんです？
　行きますよ。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50155.ko:
<voice 02369_00050155><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: <pc> 씨, 뭐 하십니까?
　가죠.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50155.zh-Hans:
<voice 02369_00050155><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001><pc>，你在干嘛？
走了。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50155.zh-Hant:
<voice 02369_00050155><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001><pc>，你在幹嘛？
走囉。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50156.en:
<voice 02704_00050156><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>See. You got through, didn't you? I suppose I can
see a little bit of the future.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50156.ja:
<voice 02704_00050156><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「ほら。通れたでしょう？
　私には　ちょっとした　未来が見えるのです。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50156.ko:
<voice 02704_00050156><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 어때요. 통과했죠?
　전 미래를 좀 볼 수 있거든요.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50156.zh-Hans:
<voice 02704_00050156><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>看吧，这不就顺利通过了吗？
我能预见不久之后的事。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50156.zh-Hant:
<voice 02704_00050156><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>看吧，這不就順利通過了嗎？
我能預見不久之後的事。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50157.en:
<voice 02734_00050157><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Now then, we're one step closer to Gran Zedora Kingdom.
Let's keep moving.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50157.ja:
<voice 02734_00050157><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「さあ　グランゼドーラ王国まで　あと一歩。
　先を急ぐとしましょう。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50157.ko:
<voice 02734_00050157><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 자, 그랑제도라 왕국까지
　얼마 안 남았습니다. 어서 가죠.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50157.zh-Hans:
<voice 02734_00050157><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>马上就要到古兰泽朵拉王国了，
我们快走吧。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50157.zh-Hant:
<voice 02734_00050157><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>馬上就要到古蘭澤朵拉王國了，
我們快走吧。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
